    • Method Detail

      • createRating

        public WrappedResponse<RatingResponse> createRating(Long accountId,
                                           Enums.ClassNameApiMap ratableType,
                                           Long ratableId,
                                           Integer ratingValue,
                                           Long categoryId,
                                           String locationDescription,
                                           Location location)
                                             throws SirqulException
        This is used to leave rating on a ratable object (i.e. retailer locations). Each user can only rate on a ratable object once per category. If a user rates on the same object and category, the previous rating will be overwritten. Leaving a rating on a ratable object will be visible to everyone who has access to view the object.

        Target API Endpoint: /rating/create
        Parameters:
        accountId - The unique accountId that made the request (either deviceId or accountId must be used, deviceId sent automatically)
        ratableType - The ratable object type {RETAILER_LOCATION}
        ratableId - The id of the ratable object
        ratingValue - The integer value of 0-255
        categoryId - the category id
        locationDescription - The description of the location
        location - The current location of the user
        Returns:
        WrappedResponse<RatingResponse> on success, SirqulResponse on failure
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • deleteRating

        public SirqulResponse deleteRating(Long accountId,
                          Long ratingId)
                            throws SirqulException
        Sets a rating as deleted.

        Target API Endpoint: /rating/delete
        Parameters:
        accountId - The unique accountId that made the request (either deviceId or accountId must be used)
        ratingId - The ID of the rating to delete
        Returns:
        SirqulResponse with success or error message
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchLocationRatingIndexes

        public SearchResponse<RatingIndexResponse> searchLocationRatingIndexes(List<Long> categoryIds,
                                                              String keyword,
                                                              Enums.RatingIndexApiMap sortField,
                                                              Boolean descending,
                                                              Integer start,
                                                              Integer limit,
                                                              Double searchRange,
                                                              Location location,
                                                              Boolean returnOverallRating)
                                                                throws SirqulException
        Search for retailer locations by averages near you.

        Target API Endpoint: /location/rating/index/search
        Parameters:
        categoryIds - Comma separated list of category ids to filter the results by
        keyword - The keyword used to search
        sortField - The column to sort the search on {ID, CREATED, UPDATED, ACTIVE, RATABLE_TYPE, RATABLE_ID, RATABLE_DISPLAY, CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_SHORT_NAME, CATEGORY_DISPLAY, COUNT, SUMMATION, AVERAGE, VALUE}
        descending - The order to return the search results
        start - The record to begin the return set on
        limit - The number of records to return
        searchRange - The search radius in kilometers to filter results
        location - the current location of the user
        returnOverallRating - Determines whether to return the overall rating record instead
        Returns:
        SearchResponse<RatingIndexResponse> on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchRatingIndexes

        public SearchResponse<RatingIndexResponse> searchRatingIndexes(Enums.ClassNameApiMap ratableType,
                                                      List<Long> ratableIds,
                                                      List<Long> categoryIds,
                                                      String keyword,
                                                      Enums.RatingIndexApiMap sortField,
                                                      Boolean descending,
                                                      Integer start,
                                                      Integer limit)
                                                        throws SirqulException
        Search for ratable items by averages.

        Target API Endpoint: /rating/index/search
        Parameters:
        ratableType - Filter results by a ratable type {RETAILER_LOCATION}
        ratableIds - Comma separated list of ratable ids to filter the resuts by
        categoryIds - Comma separated list of category ids to filter the results by
        keyword - The keyword used to search
        sortField - The column to sort the search on {ID, CREATED, UPDATED, ACTIVE, RATABLE_TYPE, RATABLE_ID, RATABLE_DISPLAY, CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_SHORT_NAME, CATEGORY_DISPLAY, COUNT, SUMMATION, AVERAGE, VALUE}
        descending - The order to return the search results
        start - The record to begin the return set on
        limit - The number of records to return
        Returns:
        SearchResponse<RatingIndexResponse> on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • searchRatings

        public SearchResponse<RatingResponse> searchRatings(Long accountId,
                                           Enums.ClassNameApiMap ratableType,
                                           Long ratableId,
                                           List<Long> categoryIds,
                                           String keyword,
                                           Enums.RatingApiMap sortField,
                                           Boolean descending,
                                           Integer start,
                                           Integer limit)
                                             throws SirqulException
        Search for ratings on a ratable object.

        Target API Endpoint: /rating/search
        Parameters:
        accountId - The account id of the user (deviceId or accountId required, deviceId sent automatically)
        ratableType - The ratable object type {RETAILER_LOCATION}
        ratableId - The id of the ratable object
        categoryIds - Comma separated list of category ids to filter the results by
        keyword - The keyword used to search
        sortField - The column to sort the search on {ID, CREATED, UPDATED, ACTIVE, OWNER_DISPLAY, RATABLE_TYPE, RATABLE_ID, RATABLE_DISPLAY, CATEGORY_ID, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_SHORT_NAME, CATEGORY_DISPLAY, VALUE}
        descending - The order to return the search results
        start - The record to begin the return set on
        limit - The number of records to return
        Returns:
        SearchResponse<RatingResponse> on a valid response, SirqulResponse on an invalid response
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.

      • updateRating

        public WrappedResponse<RatingResponse> updateRating(Long accountId,
                                           Long ratingId,
                                           Integer ratingValue,
                                           Long categoryId,
                                           String locationDescription,
                                           Location location)
                                             throws SirqulException
        Update an existing rating. Only the creator of the rating have permission to update.

        Target API Endpoint: /rating/update
        Parameters:
        accountId - The unique accountId that made the request (either deviceId or accountId must be used)
        ratingId - The id of the rating (Note: this is not the ratable object id)
        ratingValue - The rating value to update
        categoryId - the category id
        locationDescription - The description of the location
        location - The current location of the user
        Returns:
        WrappedResponse<RatingResponse> on success, SirqulResponse on failure
        Throws:
        SirqulException - the SirqulException. A custom exception type specifically thrown by this Sirqul SDK.
